thread.title: April showers *actually* bring so many new things to Netflix next month
thread.title_full: April showers *actually* bring so many new things to Netflix next month

author: Aly Horne
title: April showers *actually* bring so many new things to Netflix next month
text:
April showers *actually* bring so many new things to Netflix next month If you, like so many of us, plan your weekends around what’s on Netflix, we’ve got NEWS for you. The list of what’s coming to Netflix in April 2017 is here , so we’re basically set for the next month so far as how we’re spending out time.
From some TV shows we’ve been dying to see but haven’t had easy access to ( Wynonna Earp season one , badass demon fighting Western show about Wyatt Earp’s great granddaughter!) to classic movies we’re suuuuper excited to revisit (anybody else haunted by watching Gremlins too young ?), April’s line up is so good that we’re not even jealous of everybody we know attending Coachella.
So without further adieu, here’s what you should keep an eye out for next month!
Available April 1 A Weekend with the Family (2016)
A Nightmare on Elm Street (1984)
Across the Universe (2007)
An American Tail (1986)
An American Tail: Fievel Goes West (1991)
An American Tail: The Mystery of the Night Monster (1999)
